ThingDef.label: Chaocow
ThingDef.description: A large, unpredictable beast only found through extreme mutagenic exposure upon a human. They cannot breed, but are very powerful fighters.

ThingDef.label: Chaofox
ThingDef.description: A large, graceful creature that most resembles a mix of fox and horse that can move quite swiftly. Like all chaomorphs, they are sterile. Also, the wings are non-functional because wing-powered flight as a concept does not exist on the rim.

ThingDef.label: Chaodino
ThingDef.description: A raptor-like, nimble and clawed carnivore terrifies the local populace. Outrunning most prey, the Chaodino is one of the fastest, and fluffiest killers on the rim. If you planned to revert it, you may have trouble -- they might eat you first.

ThingDef.label: Chaomeld
ThingDef.description: A fusion of two morphs, who first begin their transformation inside a mutagenic chamber, which one is then siphoned to and melded with another. They share two minds, yet one body -- so while they have higher consciousness it may take some time for them to get used to their new arrangement.

ThingDef.label: chaomeld
ThingDef.description: A fusion of two morphs, who first begin their transformation inside a mutagenic chamber, which one is then siphoned to and melded with another. They share two minds, yet one body -- so while they have higher consciousness it may take some time for them to get used to their new arragement.

ThingDef.description: A fusion of two morphs, who first begin their transformation inside a mutagenic chamber, which one is then siphoned to and melded with another. They share two minds, yet one body -- so while they have higher consciousness it may take some time for them to get used to their new arragement.

ThingDef.label: Chaomeld
ThingDef.description: A fusion of two morphs, who first begin their transformation inside a mutagenic chamber, which one is then siphoned to and melded with another. They share two minds, yet one body -- so while they have higher consciousness it may take some time for them to get used to their new arragement.

ThingDef.label: Chaofusion
ThingDef.description: A towering fusion of two morphs, who first begin their transformation inside a mutagenic chamber, which one is then siphoned to and melded with another. They share two minds, yet one body -- so while they have higher consciousness it may take some time for them to get used to their new arragement. This meld is gigantic and terrifyingly efficient in combat.
